annotations.description: Harry McElhone is the bartender fist credited with publishing the Old Pal. Born in Scotland, Harry cut his teeth bartending at Ciro's bar in London in 1922 a...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Old Pal

textContent:
1oz (30ml) Rye
1oz (30ml) Dry Vermouth
1oz (30ml) Campari
Orange Twist

or

1.5oz (45ml) Rye Whiskey
.75oz (22.5ml) Dry Vermouth
.75oz (22.5ml) Campari
Orange Twist

or

2oz (60ml) Old Overholt Rye 
.75oz (22.5ml) Dolin Dry Vermouth
.75oz (22.5ml) Campari

Stir and pour. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BkUUHnEc5_c&t=0s
title: Old Pal
